entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Estevan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 a.m. CST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning early this morning and ending this afternoon. Rain and flurries early this morning. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to snow at times heavy and local blowing snow near midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Tuesday 18 April 2023
